attributes.action: Get Utilities company to cut the price for gas and electric in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wonder why we still have to pay high prices, here in Scotland, when we have more Windfarms now than ever before, we have more hydro stations, and Gas is from the North sea, I think its time these Greedy companys think of people and reduce the cost of essentials for the young, elderly, poor or middle class in scotland

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
